definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: muchness, force, abundance, exceedingly (cf. As. mu’du, abundance, Hom:ZMG 1878, 711 (‘treasures ana mu’di, in abundance’) Dl:HWB 399):—
force, might, †De 6:5 [[וּבְכָל־מְאׂדְֶָ]] and with all thy might; hence 2Ki 23:25.
in diff. idioms (298 t.) to express the idea of exceedingly, greatly, very (whether of magnitude or degree):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (so mostly) as adv. acc., qualifying both adjj. and obs., Ge 1:31 [[טוֹב מְאׂד]] good exceedingly, Ge 4:5 [[וַיִּחַד לְקַיִן מְאׂד]] and Cain was wroth exceedingly, Ge 7:18 [[מְאׂד]] [[וַיִּרְבּוּ]] [[הַמַּיִם]] [[וַיִּגְבְּרוּ]], Ge 12:14, Ge 13:2 [[בַּמִּקְנֶה]] [[מְאׂד]] [[כָּבֵד]] [[וְאַבְרָם]], v:Ge 13:13 [[מאד]] ´[[חַטָּאִים לי]], Ge 18:20, Ge 19:3, Ge 19:9, Ge 21:11, Ge 24:16, Ge 24:35, + oft., Ps 46:2 [[נִמְחָא מְאׂד עֶזְרָה בְחָרוֹת]] as a help in troubles, to be found (= present) exceedingly; with an inf. Is 47:9 [[בְּעָחְמַת חֲבָרַיִח מְאׂד]] despite of thy spells being very numerous, Jos 9:13 [[מֵרׂב הַדֶּרֶח מְאׂד]], 1Ki 7:47; [[הַרְבֵּה מְאׂד]] Ge 15:1, Ge 41:49, De 3:5 +, for which in the later language is found [[לָרׂב מְאׂד]] †Zec 14:14, 2Ch 4:18, 2Ch 9:9 (in 1Ki 10:10 [[הַרְבֵּה מְאׂד]]), 2Ch 24:24, 2Ch 30:13, and even [[לְהַרְבֵּה מְאׂד]] †2Ch 11:12, 2Ch 16:8. [[מְאׂד]] is not usually separated from the word it qualifies by more than one or two words (as Ge 20:8 [[האנשׁים מאד וייראו]], Nu 11:10 [[מאד]] ´[[ויחר אף י]]); see, however, De 30:14, Ju Jdg 12:2, 2Sa 12:5, 1Ki 11:19, Ps 31:12. It precedes its verb, † Ps 47:10 [[מְאׂד נַעֲלָה]] (hence Ps 97:9), Ps 92:6.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: [[בִּמְאׂד מְאׂד]] lit. with muchness, muchness, †Ge 17:2, Ge 17:6, Ge 17:20, Ex 1:7 (all P), Ez Eze 9:9, Eze 16:13.
